DOC.brief_title: Effect Of A Biofortified Food Basket On Micronutrient Status And Immune And Cognitive Function Among Infants In India
DOC.detailed_description: Iron , zinc , vitamin A deficiency remain major worldwide public health problem especially develop country India . In randomized study , 200 child age 6-24 month ( potentially lactate mother ) Mumbai , Maharashtra , India feed multiple food crop basket ( contain either four biofortified commercially-available food crop ) three time per day , six day per week , nine month . The goal study examine effect biofortified multiple food crop basket immune function , growth , cognitive function age group . The key outcome measure biomarkers vitamin A , iron zinc status , growth ( anthropometric z-scores ) , immune cognitive function . Nutrient biomarkers assess enrollment ( baseline ) , intermediate time point ( midline ; random serial sampling ) 9 month follow-up ( endline ) . Additionally , measure concentration C-reactive protein ( CRP ) alpha 1-acid glycoprotein ( AGP ) , iron zinc biomarkers influence inflammation . To assess cognitive function , multiple specific aspect memory , attention , process speed assess . Higher-level , integrative cognitive ability require coordination multiple specific function , problem-solving exploratory behavior global aspect attention free play toy , also assess . In addition , Bayley III test conduct baseline , intermediate , endline assessment obtain broad measure attainment developmental milestone use compare characteristic cohort report literature .
